body: man the plot  looks really interesting sadly not translated sigh sigh sigh! i remember reading another one with a similar Plot named  MY OFFICE   but hmm there the MC a sucker that its manipulated  too easy by  any girl that offers him pussy, even the  girl  he likes that its supposed to be almost a  saint xD its just a BITCH that  fucks  and cheat him  once the start dating  but he keeps thinking that she is a saint lol eveyone except him already fucked her ahahahha really hilarous its a good read if you want to laugh at a MC that its beyond idiot
